page.title: 08A DAY IN PHILIP'S LIFE, 10
page.content: MOST MORNINGS AT ABOUT 7.00 I GET UP AND GO DOWNSTAIRS FOR BREAKFAST OF BACON,EGG,SAUSAGE AND TOMATO. AFTER BREAKFAST I GO UPSTAIRS TO WASH AND DRESS. I WEAR A PAIR OF JEANS,SOCKS, A JUMPER, A T SHIRT AND SOME PANTS. I PUT MY SHOES ON AND GET MY BAG. THEN I SET OFF ON MY WALK TO SCHOOL. AT ABOUT 8.45 I ARRIVE AND GO ON THE COMPUTER. AT 9.00 I GO IN AND SIT DOWN AT MY DESK. IN 6 AND A HALF HOURS EVERY TUESDAY WE DO MATHS, CALCULATORS, HAVE DINNER AND DO CRAFT. AT HALF PAST THREE I LEAVE SCHOOL. WHEN I GET HOME I HAVE SOME TEA AND GO OUT TO PLAY FOR 2 HOURS.WHEN I COME INSIDE I WATCH "BUSMAN'S HOLIDAY" ON THE TELEVISION. AFTER THAT I GO UPSTAIRS AND HAVE A BATH .I WATCH SOME MORE TELEVISION BEFORE I GO TO BED.ON SATURDAYS,I GO TO GRAN'S,WHERE I FEED THE CHICKENS AND CHECK MY RABBIT AND FOX TRAPS.
